originalText.text: Dr. Mark E. Pruzansky is an excellent hand surgeon and caring doctor.  I would recommend his services to anyone who is searching for a pioneer in his field. I was very pleased with the quality of care that I received from him and his staff.  I will continue to see him in the future should any issues arise with my hands or wrists.  I trust him whole heartedly with any surgical procedure pertaining to my hands or wrists because my past surgical results were exemplary.

originalText.text: Dr. Pruzansky The Elder (Mark) is one of the best doctors I have ever consulted, and believe me, I've consulted many, many doctors in my lifetime. He not only knows everything there is to know about hand and arm injuries and how to treat them surgically, but he is also patient, friendly, completely professional, and even has a great sense of humor (when appropriate). He has operated on three of my trigger fingers, all of which have healed up beautifully, are totally pain-free, and are usable again. He is truly a five-star MD.

originalText.text: Dr. Mark Pruzansky is a superb hand surgeon. He is skilled in his profession and the office staff is equally efficient. I am very pleased with my surgery and pre/post treatments.

text.text: Dr. Mark Pruzansky is a superb hand surgeon. He is skilled in his profession and the office staff is equally efficient. I am very pleased with my surgery and pre/post treatments.

originalText.text: I'm still healing but I already know that Dr. Pruzansky is a great doctor! Was very happy to get my pins out!! This was the first time ever breaking a bone & also getting surgery and he could tell I was nervous.. He calmed me down and went through everything! Also he acknowledged about trying to get me back to rugby when I can. He is super knowledgeable and the staff there is super friendly! I highly recommend coming here!!

originalText.text:
I had an almost life-changing experience and highly recommend Dr. Mark Pruzansky.
Surgery performed by him on my wrist allowed me to use my hand without pain for the first time in years. Dr. Pruzansky instantly knew what was wrong and offered me several treatment options, including very conservative ones. I chose surgery and don’t regret my choice even one bit. With some occupational therapy and self-massaging, my wrist healed perfectly, and the scar was barely visible already after a few months. Both at the office and in the clinic where surgery took place, every one was extremely friendly and caring.
